Today marks the 72nd anniversary of the #nanjingmassacre , one of the worst possible war crimes during #WWII. 
Same as the Holocaust, these are the atrocities that we’ll never forget, and strive to prevent them from happening again. https://t.co/7FU4qWiVHH

1205310460293042176.full_text: 82 years ago, Japanese troops committed a 40-day long massacre  in Nanjing, killing over 300,000 people.
